article: I am an English girl. My name is Lily. I am thirteen. I am at school. Look! This is my school. It is No. 14 Middle School. I am in Class 1, Grade 1. I am in row 3. I am No. 12 at schhol. I have a good friend. She is a girl. Her name is Mary. She is not at school today. I think she is at home. My Chinese teacher is Miss Gao. She is a very good teacher. I don't know her age.
